title: Can't see weekly free rotations
body: So I started playing League couple days ago... I already got to level 10, but I can't see weekly free rotations. I can see only couple of champs. So I'm wondering from which level are free rotations? Or why can't I see them? Thx for answers

replies.body:
I believe the normal free rotation starts at level 11, so you're just about there. Once the normal free rotation unlocks you'll be able to spot the free champs by this icon. 

https://i.gyazo.com/6c2fb6668098f9a99aecc0a405bc9022.png
Just got to level 11... I can see them now.. Thx
